scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run build-renderer && electron-builder
scripts.start: npm run build-ts && npm run build-renderer && electron .
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n vite,ts,app -c blue,magenta,green "vite" "tsc -w" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 dist/main/index.js dist/main/preload.js && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 nodemon --watch dist/main/index.js --watch dist/main/preload.js --ext js --ignore dist/main/**/*.map --delay 250ms --exec 'electron . --dev'"
scripts.dev:electron: cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 nodemon --watch dist/main/index.js --watch dist/main/preload.js --ext js --ignore dist/main/**/*.map --delay 250ms --exec 'electron . --dev'
